trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Queen Creek
There were no other sightings in Queen Creek on or around August 9th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsTraveling north on Ganzel road, I noticed what I thought was a large aircraft, As I drove closer, I noticed the object was moving entirely too slowly, and there was no noise even though it was relatively close to the ground. As I got closer to home, I noticed it had flown over my general neighborhood area, and was traveling west toward Williamsfield Airport. It appeared as if it came from the Superstition Mountain Area. Normally I would have been more sceptical, but this was no known aircraft. The object appeared to be black, but it was night time so it could have been any dark color. The white lights could be described as almost searchlights of high power. There was also a flashing red light in the center of the bottom of the object. Also of note, but possibly just coincidence was a unusually visible falling star(meteorite) appearing before I saw the object. This is my testimony of what I saw.
Summary: Three bright lights equidistant triangle pattern, very slow moving, silent
